hooks.statusMessage: Validating git commit (must show changes summary first)

hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && CODE_CHANGES=$(git diff --name-only HEAD 2>/dev/null; git diff --name-only --cached 2>/dev/null) && if [ -z "$CODE_CHANGES" ] || echo "$CODE_CHANGES" | grep -qvE '\.(md|json)$|^\.claude/|^\.beads/'; then npm test --run 2>/dev/null || (echo 'Tests failing - run npm test to see details. NOTE: If test failures are pre-existing (not caused by changes in this session), do NOT attempt to fix them. Only fix tests broken by YOUR changes in the current session.' >&2 && exit 2); fi
hooks.statusMessage: Running tests (skipped if only .md/.json/.claude/.beads files changed)
